about_the_game:
Stories is a choice driven RPG where your enlightened choices will forge your path. Survive in a ruthless desert while unraveling the mystery of Egypt's leaders! Will you be the master of your own destiny, or will you let others write the chapters of your stories...


Stories is my take on the famous Choose Your Own Adventure books genre.
The amazing city of Heliopolis is soon to be under attack by the Persian army. At the same time, you have discovered some very disturbing secrets about Egypt's most prominent figures. Are they harboring secrets that could alter the course of the war? Which side will you choose?

Stories is split into two major phases.

Exploring the City

While within the walls of Heliopolis, you will have control (mostly ;)) over your actions. You will gather resources, meet people, and avoid malicious encounters to prepare yourself for the unforgiving nature of the desert.

Surviving in the Desert

The desert completely surrounds Heliopolis. It's scorching hot, food is scarce, and water is long gone. But beneath its burning sands lie very valuable treasures. You can explore wherever you want, in whichever direction you choose... You might encounter people, animals, experience hallucinations, explore forgotten tombs... But always keep an eye on your vital signs...

But be careful, in Stories time is ticking fast...

Features

  • 500+ Unique Events
  • 1.000+ Choices
  • Unique Desert Exploration System
  • Inventory & Crafting
  • 20+ Equippable and Upgradable Rings with Unique Powers
  • Skills (actives and passives)
  • Moral System Affecting Events and Choices
Musique originale composée par rivblazing.
